item.title: Netflix’s ‘Monster: Ed Gein’ Has A Surprising Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: Netflix has just released Monster: The Ed Gein Story today, and its Rotten Tomatoes score is very surprising, given its high profile.

item.title: The ‘Halo’ Show Is Now On Netflix, And You Must See It To Believe It
item.description: Netflix has just gotten one of the most ridiculous video game adaptations ever, Paramount's Halo show that aired a year ago.
